description: Cluster designed for tagging OSINT artifacts with relevant strategic framework information. Specifically for Block-H, these tags are related to the secure aquisition and development of cybersystems for Healthcare purposes.
name: HITRUST CSF - System Acquisition AND Development

values.description: Information security related requirements are included in the requirements for new information systems or enhancements to existing information systems.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF System Acquisition AND Development: 10.a Information Security Requirements Analysis and Specification

values.description: Information involved in application services passing over public networks are protected from fraudulent activity, contract dispute and unauthorized disclosure and modification.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF System Acquisition AND Development: 10.b Securing Application Services on Public Networks

values.description: Information involved in application service transactions are protected to prevent incomplete transmission, mis-routing, unauthorized message alteration, unauthorized disclosure, unauthorized message duplication or replay.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF System Acquisition AND Development: 10.c Protecting Application Services Transactions

values.description: Information is protected when interconnecting business information components and systems.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF System Acquisition AND Development: 10.d Internal System Connections

values.description: Rules for the development of software and systems are established and applied to developments within the organization.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF System Acquisition AND Development: 10.e Secure Development Policy

values.description: Changes to systems within the development lifecycle are controlled by the use of formal change control procedures.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF System Acquisition AND Development: 10.f System Change Control Procedures

values.description: Business critical applications are reviewed and tested when operating platforms are changed to ensure there are no adverse impact on organizational operations or security.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF System Acquisition AND Development: 10.g Technical Review of Applications After Operating Platform Changes

values.description: Modifications to software packages are discouraged, limited to necessary changes and all changes are strictly controlled.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF System Acquisition AND Development: 10.h Restrictions on Changes to Software Packages

values.description: Principles for engineering secure systems are established, documented, maintained and applied to any information system implementation effort.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF System Acquisition AND Development: 10.i Secure System Engineering Principles

values.description: Secure development environments for system development and integration efforts that cover the entire system development lifecycle are established and provide an appropriate level of protection.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF System Acquisition AND Development: 10.j Secure Development Environment

values.description: Testing of security functionality is carried out during development.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF System Acquisition AND Development: 10.l System Security Testing

values.description: Acceptance testing programs and related criteria are established for the acceptance of new information systems, upgrades and new versions.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF System Acquisition AND Development: 10.m System Acceptance

values.description: Test data is selected carefully, protected and controlled.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF System Acquisition AND Development: 10.n Protection of Test Data

values.description: Errors, loss, unauthorized modification or misuse of information while processing information in applications is prevented.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF System Acquisition AND Development: 10.o Processing Integrity

values.description: The activity of out- sourced system development is supervised and monitored.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF System Acquisition AND Development: 10.k Outsourced Development
